sentences: Juhtumit on veel palju tegemist selles projektis.
See juhtum näitas meile kõik võimalused.
context: The word 'juhtumit' is the partitive form of 'juhtum', which means 'case' or 'incident'. The partitive case in Estonian is used to indicate an incomplete or indefinite quantity, so this would translate to '(a) case' or '(an) incident'. It's commonly used when referring to specific instances or situations that need examination or investigation.
